brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Animation

The diagram depicts a T IA/EIA 568A straight through cable connecting two dissimilar interfaces: a PC on the left and a switch on the right. The transmit and receive Pair 2 (wires 1 and 2) and Pair 3 (wires 3 and 6) between the PC and switch are straight wired.
PC end of cable:
One. Green/White, Transmit.
Two. Green, Transmit.
Three. Orange/White, Receive.
Four. Blue.
Five. Blue/White.
Six. Orange, Receive.
Seven. Brown/White.
Eight. Brown.

Switch end of cable:
One. Green/White, Receive.
Two. Green, Receive.
Three. Orange/White, Transmit.
Four. Blue.
Five. Blue/White.
Six. Orange, Transmit.
Seven. Brown/White.
Eight. Brown.
